procedure: Shake in an iced cocktail shaker, and strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.
Pour whiskey into Collins glass filled with ice.
Fill to desired level with 7 Up.
Stir lightly.
Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass.
Strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with an orange peel or twist.
Mix in an old fashioned glass with ice and serve.
Pour into highball glass over rocks.
Stir.
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.
Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
Crack an egg into a tall glass, leaving the yolk unbroken.
Pour in whiskey.
Add Tabasco to taste, or serve on the side.
Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into a highball glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist.
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.
Add 3 parts prosecco, 2 parts Aperol and top up with soda water, garnish with a slice of orange and serve.
Mix in a shaker, then pour into a chilled glass.
Garnish and serve.
Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.
Garnish with a cherry.
Layer ingredients into a shot glass.
Serve with a stirrer.
Float Irish cream on top of coffee liqueur.
Shake pour ingredients with ice.
Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.
Shake with ice and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.
Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine.
Stir gently.
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain.
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes and then add the Irish whiskey and then Irish Mist.
Stir gently.
Mix equal parts stout and Champagne.
Layer guinness on top of the pale ale or lager.
Fill mixing glass with gin, vermouth, and bitters.
Add ice and stir until chilled, then add strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lemon peel.
Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass.
Garnish.
Combine all ingredients with ice, stir or shake, then pour into a hurricane glass with the ice.

For garnish score pineapple or orange slice with a knife and insert onto rim of glass; optionally use toothpick or cocktail umbrella to spear maraschino cherry through center and attach to top of fruit slice; otherwise float cherry on top of ice.
pour vodka and blue curacao in a shaker with ice, shake well & strain into ice filled highball glass, top with lemonade, garnish and serve.
Stir with ice, strain, garnish and serve.
Build over ice; stir.
Garnish with twist of lemon peel.
Fill glass with crushed ice.
Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over.
Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect.
Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.
Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.
Stir well with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker, then strain into a chilled Collins glass and top with a splash of chilled club soda or seltzer.
Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
Stir together and serve over ice.
Mix or shake in cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
Strain into glass and serve.
Pour into cocktail shaker all ingredients with ice cubes, shake well.
Strain in chilled cocktail or martini glass.
Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served straight up.
Pour the orange juice into glass and top up Champagne.
Stir gently, garnish and serve.
Mix and garnish.
Blend all the ingredients together in a blender, including the ice, and then strain into a hurricane glass.
Place cherry on top of the drink as a garnish and serve.
Whipped cream can also be added as a garnish to the top of the drink before the cherry.
Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
Garnish with lime wedge.
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes.
Shake well.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry.
Serve without a straw.
Pour the tequila and unfiltered apple cider into glass over ice.
Add the lemon juice and creme de cassis and stir.
Garnish and serve.
Combine ingredients with ice in cocktail shaker; shake well, then strain into cocktail glass, pouring over ice.
In a shaker add white rum, Malibu, lime juice, some mint leaves and crushed ice, garnish with the sprig of mint.
Shake the vodka and citrus juices in a mixer, then strain into the glass.
Slide the grenadine down one side of the glass, where it will sink to the bottom.
Slide the curacao down the other side, to lie between the vodka and grenadine, and serve before the layers have a chance to mix.
Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass, add mint.
Stir with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Strain into a large cocktail glass.
Garnish with lime slice.
Fill highball (tall) glass with ice.
Mix lime soda, lemonade, guava nectar, and grenadine syrup together to form a mixture.
Pour rum into glasses over ice, then evenly layer the guava mixture over the rum.
Mix as desired.
Garnish with a half-slice of lemon.
